author: Evelyn Cheng
description: The digital currency bitcoin jumped to a fresh all-time high Thursday as global investors looked for safe haven trades.
title: Bitcoin jumps to fresh record near $1,900 amid increased political risk

author: Arjun Kharpal
description: Factors including increased trading in Japan to debates over the future the bitcoin's underlying technology have boosted the price.
title: Bitcoin hits $1,900 to reach record high with market cap up $3.7 billion this week alone

author: Reuters
description: In one case, alleged hackers from North Korea demanded bitcoin in exchange for client information.
title: Researchers Think the WannaCry Ransomware Attack Is Similar to Those From North Korea

author: Rory Carroll
description: Hollywood Reporter says CEO Bob Iger has told employees that film would be released in segments online unless hackers were paid in bitcoin
title: Pirates of the Caribbean 5: hackers threaten to post film online unless Disney pays ransom

author: YOUKYUNG LEE
description: SEOUL, South Korea (AP) â€” Cybersecurity experts are pointing to circumstantial evidence that North Korea may be behind the global "ransomware" attack: the way the hackers took hostage computers and servers across the world was similar to previous cyberattacks attributed to North Korea. Simon Choi, a director at South Korean anti-virus software company Hauri Inc. who has analyzed North Korean malware since 2008 and advises the government, said Tuesday that the North is no newcomer to the world of bitcoins. It has been mining the digital currency using malicious computer programs since as early as 2013, he said.
title: Experts see possible North Korea links to global cyberattack
